CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF( CONTAINS($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, 'visual'), 'https://'+ MID($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( 'visual', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)-4,4) +'salesforce.com/', LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) ) + "apex/TimelineListView?id=" + Id, IF( CONTAINS($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, 'visual'), 'https://'+ MID($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( 'visual', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)-4,4) +'salesforce.com/', LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) ))
CustomField.label: List View URL
